rows.label: qev085802_MSG0001
rows.name:
Man, you guys really saved our bacon.
Now we can finally get back to work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0002
rows.name: You have our thanks. And I'm sure Lao's as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0003
rows.name: Don't mention it. We're just doing our job, same as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0004
rows.name:
Do you guys have any idea where Lao is,
or why he just up and left like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0005
rows.name: No idea. And even less of an idea when he'll return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0006
rows.name: I'm sure he's just giving us a chance to grow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0007
rows.name: Suuure he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0009
rows.name: What? Don't give me that look! I still trust him. ...Mostly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, I'd be pretty upset if someone forgot to restock
and then left me stranded...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0011
rows.name: Actually, that was our mistake, not his.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0012
rows.name: He just left us deadweights behind while he finished the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0013
rows.name: He's always been like that, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0014
rows.name: Always? Wait, you must be—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0015
rows.name: Saiden, ma'am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0016
rows.name: I've been working with Lao since we were back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0017
rows.name:
Truth be told, he's the only reason I ever
made it into Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0018
rows.name: Without his recommendation, I'd be long dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0019
rows.name: Me and Mondo worked on the FrontierNav development team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0020
rows.name: Needless to say, we've been big fans of Lao's ever since![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0021
rows.name: Oh, I'm Shingo, by the way. And that there is Mondo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0022
rows.name:
I had no idea you guys had such respect for Lao.
I'm sorry if it sounded like I was bad-mouthing him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0023
rows.name: Anyway, are you all set here now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, we should be fine. Except—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0025
rows.name: Except...what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0026
rows.name:
Well, we still have a probe to place,
but the location is swarming with indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0027
rows.name:
We usually let Lao do most of the fighting.
And by most, I mean all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0028
rows.name: If that's the case, we'd be happy to escort you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0029
rows.name:
Really? Wow! It'd be an honor to
work with your team, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0030
rows.name: We'll move as fast as we can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0031
rows.name: Hmm... Tatsu getting oddly similar vibe from these two...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0032
rows.name:
It's embarrassing to say, but without Lao we're no
match for the indigens out here. We're really grateful
you all came along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0033
rows.name: We can give you the details once we've arrived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085802_MSG0034
rows.name:
If you could clear the way to the date probe placement
site south of here, that would be awesome.[ST:wait ]
